name: Schedules and exhibits
text: [§431:4-235]  Schedules and exhibits.   Reporting of the information required in schedule A under section 431:4-232 and in schedule B under section 431:4-233, and the exhibit entitled "stockholders information supplement-financial reporting to stockholder" shall be made on forms or in a format approved by the commissioner. [L 2000, c 24, pt of §2]
